document_data.name: Rashturiver
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rashturiver''' was a river in [[Amn]] that fed [[Lake Weng]].
document_data.Geography: This river began in the [[Cloud Peaks]] northeast of Lake Weng and due west of [[Citadel Rashturl]]. It had a waterfall near its source and had a twisted course until it reached the [[Amnurflow]].
document_data.History: The river was named for the famous Amnian general [[Rashturl]].
